page.title: 14GHOST STORIES (CONT.)
page.content: next to Lurcock's the grocers. The two properties had once been joined and had been built during the 15th. century.The lady who lived there,now owns the hairdressers.She said that once when she was ill she saw a quaker ghost in her bedroom.He was wearing a large black hat.Her friend who was a medium, had come to visit her and had said that she might be visited by a ghost.Well she was right! {Mystery in Room 7! }In the square in Lenham there is a hotel which used to be called The Caravel Hotel but is now called Truffles.Room no.7 is known to have a ghost. One day one of the women employed there went up into room no.7 to make the bed as usual.That night the same woman went into room no.7 and found a distinctive imprint where someone had been laying on the bed yet no-one had checked in.
